extendedInfo.description: Find out your risk of developing diabetes with this little app. Based on a clinically validated questionnaire, it will give you the information you need to know about your diabetes risk in under a minute.You will need to know your body mass index, and will be asked 10 simple questions about your diet, lifestyle and current health.When you have your risk, why not go back and do it again and work out how you can reduce it?Please note: I do not collect any personally identifiable information.Find more apps at: http://apps.healthier-me.co.uk or contact me there with any suggestions or requests!
